entry.title: ğŸ‰ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a â­ï¸

entry.title: Rotaeno
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š2,99Â â‚¬ â†’ 1,99Â â‚¬ [1,99Â â‚¬ ~ 2,99Â â‚¬]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š1,99Â â‚¬

Compras integradas

  • 510 Stellar Gemsï¼š4,99Â â‚¬
  • 1030 Stellar Gemsï¼š9,99Â â‚¬
  • 100 Stellar Gemsï¼š0,99Â â‚¬
  • 2080 Stellar Gemsï¼š19,99Â â‚¬
  • 300 Stellar Gemsï¼š2,95Â â‚¬

Application Description

Rotaeno is a heart-pounding, thumb-tapping, wrist-flicking rhythm game that fully utilizes your device's gyroscope for an unprecedented musical experience. Rotate your device to hit notes as you soar through the stars. Drop into your headphones and immerse yourself in the kick beats and stellar synths of this astronautical adventure! =A Revolutionary Way to Experience Music= What sets Rotaeno apart is all in the name - rotation! Building on the basic controls of more traditional rhythm games, Rotaeno includes notes that require smooth turns and rapid rotations to hit, making it feel like you're drifting in a highspeed interstellar stunt race. It's a real arcade experience - in the palm of your hand! =Multi Genre Music and Beats= Rotaeno is loaded with exclusive tracks from renowned rhythm game composers. From EDM to JPOP, KPOP to Opera, the stylistically diverse song collection contains a future favorite song for every music lover! More songs are already planned for future updates and will be released on a regular basis. =A Journey to Find the Promised Land, Love, and Ourselves= Follow Ilot, our heroine, on a cosmic journey through the stars, and witness her growth as she sets out on her own. Follow in the footsteps of a friend, meet locals on different planets, and save the future of Aquaria! *Rotaeno will only function properly on devices that feature gyroscope or accelerometer support. Concerns or feedback? Contact us: rotaeno@xd.com

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: DungeonSquad
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š5,99Â â‚¬ â†’ 1,99Â â‚¬ [1,99Â â‚¬ ~ 5,99Â â‚¬]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š1,99Â â‚¬

Compras integradas

  • Season Passï¼š7,99Â â‚¬
  • Nurse Packï¼š5,99Â â‚¬
  • Unlock Beholderï¼š2,99Â â‚¬
  • Unlock Gumihoï¼š2,99Â â‚¬
  • Season 3 Battle Passï¼š1,99Â â‚¬
  • Uniform Packï¼š3,99Â â‚¬
  • Unlock Baphometï¼š2,99Â â‚¬
  • Season 2 Battle Passï¼š1,99Â â‚¬
  • Monster Pack 2ï¼š34,99Â â‚¬
  • Info Packï¼š14,99Â â‚¬

Application Description

The new game of the developer ""GameCoaster"", who made Dungeon Maker and Dungeon Defense! A seemingly infinite stream of heroes invaded the dungeon and brought ruin to the Abyss. Now you must go straight to the source of the enemy and return your home to its former glory. Defeat the Army of Light and take back the power of the Abyss. You are tasked with infiltrating a planet dominated by light all on your own. You must bring down the heroes and use them to summon monsters to fight alongside you, armed with the equipment of these fallen sacrifices. Once you are strong enough, you may receive the blessings of the Dark Gods, and combine their powers with those of your monsters to bring down colossal groups of enemies. â—‡ 10 elite monsters and over 100 unique skills â—‡ The Power of the Abyss gets stronger as you rebuild â—‡ Roguelike with random choices and opportunities

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Cultist Simulator
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š7,99Â â‚¬ â†’ 1,99Â â‚¬ [1,99Â â‚¬ ~ 7,99Â â‚¬]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š1,99Â â‚¬

Compras integradas

  • Forbidden Bundleï¼š7,99Â â‚¬
  • The Exileï¼š5,99Â â‚¬
  • The Priestï¼š1,99Â â‚¬
  • The Ghoulï¼š1,99Â â‚¬
  • The Dancerï¼š1,99Â â‚¬

Application Description

SEIZE FORBIDDEN TREASURES. SUMMON ALIEN GODS. FEED ON YOUR DISCIPLES. BE WARNED. This game has no tutorial - part of the challenge is figuring out how to play. It's hard, but keep trying, and you'll master it. Good luck! In this infamous roguelike narrative card game, play as a seeker after unholy mysteries in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories. Become a scholar of the unseen arts. Craft tools and summon spirits. Indoctrinate innocents. Seize your place as the herald of a new age. Cultist Simulator was first released on PC and has more than 200,000 players all over the world. Now weâ€™re bringing the cosmic mysteries of Cultist Simulator to mobile. â€¢ Challenging roguelike gameplay - There is never only one history. Cultist Simulator doesnâ€™t hold your hand. Experiment, expire and transcend death with a story-driven legacy system. Over time youâ€™ll learn enough to wrestle the game to its knees. â€¢ Intense, immersive narrative â€“ Combine cards to tell your own story. A hefty novelâ€™s worth of choice-based storytelling, from the creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea. There are many paths through this game of ambition, appetite and abomination, and many ways your tale can end. â€¢ A rich Lovecraftian world â€“ Corrupt your friends and consume your enemies. Search your dreams for sanity-twisting rituals. Translate grimoires and glean their lore. Penetrate the realm of the Hours and win a place in their service. Cultist Simulator brings the peripheral horror of Lovecraftâ€™s tales to an entirely new setting. Expand your knowledge with the DLCs: New Legacies, New Ascensions, New Mechanics... â€¢ The Dancer - Join the Bacchanal â€¢ The Priest - Knock, and Ye Shall Be Opened â€¢ The Ghoul - Taste of the graveyard's fruit â€¢ The Exile - Some there are who will not yield If you encounter any issue with the game, please click on â€œContact usâ€ at the bottom of this page and give us as many details as possible regarding the issue and your device: https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/11-cultist-simulator/?p=ios

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

Application Description

IMPORTANTE NÃƒO suporta: iPhone 5S, iPad Air, iPad Mini 2 e 3 e iPod Touch Interpreta a lei como entenderes em This is the Police 2, a sequela do aclamado drama noir "This Is the Police!". Administra a esquadra do xerife, gere os teus agentes, investiga, interroga e prende. Toma decisÃµes difÃ­ceis - e tenta permanecer fora da prisÃ£o! - nesta mistura de aventura, estratÃ©gia e combate tÃ¡tico por turnos. Ã‰ uma simulaÃ§Ã£o? Um jogo de gestÃ£o? Um desafio tÃ¡tico? Um romance visual? Um enigma? Ã‰ tudo isto e muito mais! Envolve-te numa experiÃªncia Ãºnica guiada pela histÃ³ria. Bem-vindo a Sharpwood. Uma cidade fronteiriÃ§a fria e agreste dilacerada pela violÃªncia, onde ninguÃ©m Ã© completamente inocente. Contrabandistas, gangues e populistas radicais dizem que esta cidade Ã© a sua casa. Para manter a paz e a ordem, a jovem xerife Lilly Reed (Sarah Hamilton) terÃ¡ que se juntar ao criminoso fugitivo Jack Boyd (Jon St. John) e rezar para que o seu perigoso plano nÃ£o se descontrole. Assume o comando da esquadra do xerife. Os teus subordinados nÃ£o sÃ£o uns meros recursos; sÃ£o pessoas comuns com as suas prÃ³prias forÃ§as, fraquezas, medos e preconceitos - e terÃ¡s que contar com todos para sobreviveres. AlguÃ©m anda a beber demais? Ou arranja sempre desculpas para faltar ao trabalho? Ou recusa-se a cumprir ordens? TerÃ¡s que mostrar mÃ£o firme se quiseres impor disciplina nesta esquadra. Envolve-te em combate tÃ¡tico. Durante as tuas operaÃ§Ãµes mais perigosas, o jogo muda para o combate por turnos. ReÃºne uma equipa com os teus melhores agentes. Estuda cuidadosamente o terreno, ajusta os teus planos, aproxima-te furtivamente dos teus suspeitos e usa armas e equipamentos nÃ£o letais - se a situaÃ§Ã£o permitir. Mas como nem sempre Ã© possÃ­vel evitar os tiroteios tem cuidado: "This Is the Police 2" nÃ£o tem pontos de vida. Uma simples bala pode custar a vida a um polÃ­cia. SÃª um verdadeiro detetive. Recolhe indÃ­cios, estuda provas, interroga suspeitos e manda os criminosos para tribunal. E se o suspeito era inocente? Talvez esteja na hora de descobrir se algum juiz de Sharpwood pode ser comprado. Obrigado por jogar â€œTHIS IS THE POLICE 2â€! entry.title: Doodle Baseball Game
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š0,99Â â‚¬ â†’ Gratuito [Gratuito ~ 2,99Â â‚¬]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼šGratuito

Application Description

Step up to the plate and experience the most exciting and fun-filled baseball game with Doodle Baseball! Dive into a hand-drawn world where sports action meets creativity. From the thrill of pitching to the excitement of hitting home runs, every moment is packed with fast-paced, action-packed gameplay. Whether youâ€™re a fan of traditional baseball, looking for a new twist on your favorite ball game, or an MLB game enthusiast, Doodle Baseball has everything you love about the sport and more! Key Features: Baseball Action Like Never Before: Whether you're swinging for a home run or making the perfect pitch, Doodle Baseball brings all the heart-pounding action of a real baseball game. From the batterâ€™s box to the backstop, every play is full of excitement. Perfect for fans of MLB games and casual baseball fun! Simple & Addictive Sports Gameplay: Easy-to-learn controls let players of all ages join in on the fun! Perfect your batting skills, steal bases, and pull off putouts with a flick of your finger. Whether you're playing solo or challenging friends in multiplayer PvP mode, the action never stops! Collectible Doodle Characters: Unlock a team of quirky, adorable characters, each with special abilities to help you dominate the diamond. Build your perfect baseball squad and take on opponents in thrilling online tournaments. Baseball Simulation Meets Arcade Fun: Enjoy a blend of realistic baseball mechanics and fast-paced arcade action. Swing for the fences, score big home runs, and lead your baseball team to victory in dynamic baseball challenges. A perfect blend for fans of both MLB-style realism and arcade action! Charming Hand-Drawn Art & Sound: Immerse yourself in a world of colorful, hand-drawn doodle graphics that bring the baseball diamond to life. With lively sound effects, energetic crowd cheers, and a catchy soundtrack, every game feels like a home run. Get ready to step up to the plate, swing for the fences, and experience the thrill of Doodle Baseball the ultimate fun baseball game for fans of sports, simulation, and arcade action! Whether you're into MLB style realism or just love the excitement of a quick ball game, this is your go-to baseball adventure. Download now and get ready for a home run experience like no other!

entry.title: RAW Power
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š14,99Â â‚¬ â†’ 5,99Â â‚¬ [5,99Â â‚¬ ~ 14,99Â â‚¬]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š5,99Â â‚¬

Application Description

OVERVIEW â€” ADVANCED RAW: Unlock the power of Apple's RAW engine with easy-to-use controls. Develop images with the same outstanding RAW processing in Appleâ€™s Aperture professional photo app. Unique adjustments let you improve your images in ways that can't be done in any other app. â€” ORGANIZE: RAW Power is a complete photo app to organize and manage your photo library. Fully compatible with iCloud Photo Library, so all changes are synced. Every image and every change is available to every app on your iPhone or iPad. â€” RATE & FILTER: Filter albums by file type, rating, flag, and edit state. Ratings and Flags sync over iCloud Photo Library! â€” FILES.APP: Store images in the Photos library or Files.app. Use our new Share extension to import from other apps directly into RAW Powerâ€™s Files container. Same non-destructive editing, rating, and filtering features! (iCloud syncing is not supported). â€” NOT JUST RAWs: RAW Power is great with JPEGs, with many tools missing from the Photos app. Plus an innovative Depth Effect for photos shot on iPhones with a dual camera system. â€” EDIT CROSS-PLATFORM: Edit on iOS and continue on the Mac (or vice-versa) using RAW Power 3 for macOS.â€¨ â€” BATCH PROCESSING: Apply presets, paste adjustments, and export multiple images. Export to the photo library or to Files.app. Using iOS 16 or later? You may be interested in Nitro Photo. It includes masking, XMP support, synchronized Pan and Zoom and many other features. Search for 'Nitro Photo' on the App Store. ORGANIZATION AND DISPLAY â€” Zoom up to 800% for extremely precise adjustments. â€” Create and rename albums, delete images from albums and the library, and move images into albums. Full access to your folder hierarchy. â€” Display file name, exposure information, flash status, and location with a map. REAL-TIME EDITING â€” Full non-destructive editing. All changes stored in the iOS Photo Library and iCloud Photo Library, so you can edit on one device and continue on another, without loss of quality. Even between Mac and iOS! â€” Optimized for small screens. Choose which adjustments to show by default and in what order â€” Unparalleled highlight recovery with Boost and Recovery sliders. Real-time control of Apple's RAW engine, including Noise Reduction, Black Point, Gamut Mapping and more â€” Auto Enhance, Auto White Balance, Auto Levels and Auto Curves. Apply them to multiple images at once! â€” Apply presets, and Copy / Paste Adjustments to one image or many â€” Histogram with Clipping Indicators and Hot Pixels Overlay â€” LUTs (Look up tables) with built-in looks and film simulations. Add your own! â€” Crop and Straighten, Rotate and Flip, White Balance with sampler and auto â€” Highlights, Shadows, Vibrancy, Local Contrast and incredible Lighten and Darken sliders â€” Curves and Levels. Curves has Linear and Lab modes, and samplers â€” Depth Effect to enhance photos shot with the dual camera system â€” Chromatic Aberration to correct lens artifacts, Perspective, Black & White, Vignette with a controllable center point â€” All sliders are real-time and GPU accelerated â€” High-precision, deep color imaging engine â€” Export JPEG, PNG, and TIFFs (8- and 16-bit) to Files.app or Photos.app COMPATIBILITY â€” Compatible with hundreds of cameras, including iPhone RAW images. (EXTENDED SUPPORT REQUIRES iOS 14. Full List at https://www.gentlemencoders.com/extended-raw/index.html) RAW support is downloaded in the background by Apple. Your device must be on WiFi and plugged in to get updates. â€” Great with JPEGs, TIFFs, PNGs, and most DNGs â€” Video Tutorials (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7l78rOzFxaHG-e5AT-MGWQ) RAW POWER for MAC RAW Power is also available on the Mac App Store as a Photos Extension and standalone app with Photos Library support. Rated 4.5 stars worldwide! ABOUT GENTLEMEN CODERS Gentlemen Coders was founded by a former Senior Director of Engineering at Apple. For more information, visit www.gentlemencoders.com.
